value:
select
distinct CAST(claim_num AS VARCHAR(35)) as claim_num,
claimant_num,
loss_item_num,
CAST(case when curr_code is null or curr_code ='' then 'CLP' else curr_code end AS VARCHAR(10)) as curr_code,
 record_eff_dtm
 from
(
select pagosinitrami.NSINIES AS claim_num, pagosinitrami.NTRAMIT as claimant_num,pagosinitrami.NTRAMIT as loss_item_num,
pagosinitrami.cmonpag as curr_code, cast(pagosinitrami.FALTA as date) as record_eff_dtm  from cdp_stg_dwh.sisaxis_pagosinitrami pagosinitrami
where pagosinitrami.FALTA is not null
group by 1,2,3,4,5
union
select reservasinitrami.NSINIES AS claim_num, reservasinitrami.NTRAMIT as claimant_num,reservasinitrami.NTRAMIT as loss_item_num,
reservasinitrami.CMONRES as curr_code, cast(reservasinitrami.FALTA as date) as record_eff_dtm  from cdp_stg_dwh.sisaxis_reservasinitrami reservasinitrami
where reservasinitrami.FALTA is not null
group by 1,2,3,4,5
union
select REPARACION.AUOR_SISI_NU_SINIESTRO  AS claim_num, REPARACION.AUOR_NU_IMPLICADO  as claimant_num,REPARACION.AUOR_NU_IMPLICADO  as loss_item_num,
'CLP' as curr_code, cast(REPARACION.AUOR_FE_REGISTRO as date) as record_eff_dtm  from cdp_stg_dwh.SISSINIESTRO_AUTT_ORDENES_REPARACION REPARACION
where REPARACION.AUOR_FE_REGISTRO is not null
group by 1,2,3,4,5
union
select a.AUDL_AUOR_NU_SINIESTRO AS claim_num, b.AUOR_NU_IMPLICADO  as claimant_num,b.AUOR_NU_IMPLICADO  as loss_item_num,
'CLP' as curr_code, cast(current_timestamp as date) as record_eff_dtm  from cdp_stg_dwh.sissiniestro_autt_detalle_ordenes a
INNER JOIN cdp_ods.sissiniestro_autt_ordenes_reparacion b ON a.audl_auor_nu_siniestro=b.AUOR_SISI_NU_SINIESTRO 
   AND a.audl_auor_nu_orden = b.AUOR_NU_ORDEN_REPARACION    AND a.audl_auor_nu_ajuste= b.auor_auad_nu_ajuste
group by 1,2,3,4,5

)sub
where sub.record_eff_dtm is not null
